snippet: The ancient martial art of muay boran is making a comeback in Thailand, in the form of first-annual world championships, despite the country’s political unrest.
abstract: Ancient martial art of muay boran is making a comeback in Thaliand, where it celebrated its first annual world championship in March despite country's political unrest.
lead_paragraph: The ancient martial art of muay boran is making a comeback in Thailand, in the form of first-annual world championships, despite the country’s political unrest.
